name: para_id
description: Para ID of the parachain, or 0 if the chain is the relay chain

name: id
description: String representation of the chain, in lowercase without spaces, suitable for subdomains

name: chain_name
description: String representation of the chain, in mixed case potentially with spaces, suitable for display

name: ss58_prefix
description: SS58 Prefix used for SS58 Encoded addresses

name: symbol
description: Primary native token of the chain
